Client: AnchorPoint/CommscopeDuration : 6 monthsPreferred Location : Charlotte, NCHybrid work schedule: (Charlotte, Claremont, and Catawba in North Carolina) The Project Manager II is responsible for planning, monitoring and managing the delivery of projects to meet agreed deliverables, scheduled timeframes and allocated budgets.
